text: Maria Balomenaki (; born March 14, 1983) is a retired Greek water polo player.Τέλος καριέρας για την Μπαλωμενάκη sport-fm.gr (in Greek) She played for Olympiacos for 12 seasons (2001–2013) and was the team's captain for several years.«Κρέμασε» το σκουφάκι η Μπαλωμενάκη novasports.gr (in Greek) She won 2 Greek Championships (2008–09, 2010–11) and numerous European honours (2007–08 LEN Trophy runners-up, 2010–11 LEN Champions Cup third place among many others).Αποσύρθηκε η Μπαλωμενάκη onsports.gr (in Greek)"Μαρία Μπαλωμενάκη σε ευχαριστούμε. Κρέμασε το ερυθρόλευκο σκουφάκι και αποσύρθηκε από την ενεργό δράση η αρχηγός." olympiacos.org (in Greek) ==References== Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Greek female water polo players Category:Olympiacos Women's Water Polo Team players
title: Maria Balomenaki
